sentences.sContent: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.sCn: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.sContent: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.sCn: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.sContent: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.sCn: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.sContent: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.sCn: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.sContent: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.sCn: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.sContent: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.sCn: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

sentences.sContent: ...a business or a country should strive to build a corporate culture or a social climate that values innovation...
...on the productivity and well-being of employees at Best Buy's corporate headquarters...
...Justice has become so expensive that only a small number of people like corporate executives can afford it...
...and that in turn shapes government policies and corporate budgets and personal spending decisions...
...So corporate welfare increases as we reduce welfare for the poor...
...Standard & Poor's and Moody's Investors Service rate the level of risk of many corporate and government bonds...
...that is determined to turn itself into more of a thought-leader and less a corporate repairman...
...One is that the men who dominate corporate boards are hopelessly sexist: they promote people like themselves and ignore any female talent...

synos.tran: [法]法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的

phrases.pCn: 公司治理；企业管治，企业治理；公司管治
公司金融；公司理财；公司融资
公司管理部门；公司主管人员
公司通讯；公司信息交流
企业公民；公司公民；公司公民意识（原形是corporate citizen）

remMethod.val: corpor(团体) ＋ ate → 法人团体的， 公司的

words.tran: 公司；法人（团体）；社团；大腹便便；市政当局

trans.tranCn: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
trans.tranOther: belonging to or relating to a corporation
